unnormalised: My grandmom was diagnosed with stage 3 ovarian cancer last year, Dr. Reddy recommended chemo and radiation. Hopefully, the treatment works out for her; she's 75 yrs old.
normalised: My grandmom was diagnosed with stage three ovarian cancer last year, Doctor Reddy recommended chemo and radiation. Hopefully, the treatment works out for her; she's seventy five years old.
